name: Waifu Dream
description:
Waifu Dream is a relationship simulator that allows you to have an interactive and fun conversation with your favorite character.

Thank you very much for the affection and all the support, I hope you enjoy these new upgrades.

Special thanks to:

  • Kawaii Girls: Ultimate Dating Simulator
  • Images
    • Kantoku
    • Shida
    • TDA Kun Dress - MMD DL
  • Music
    • 追う人 -ou hito-
      by nagisa.f (http://www.nagisaf.net/)
  • Chatbot - Mitsuku
    • https://www.pandorabots.com/mitsuku/

Site to host images

  • imgur

The project is still under development. In the course of development, I will post how the project progresses.

Looking for a waifu? Click here.

This game is a prototype
